property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Information about an Academic Time Period.

property.name: summary
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: description
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: objectDescription
property.value: A description of the entity.

property.name: summary
property.value: Gets a display code for this ATP.

property.name: description
property.value: Gets a display code for this ATP.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Start Date

property.name: summary
property.value: Date and time the academic time period became effective.

property.name: label
property.value: Start Date

property.name: description
property.value: Date and time the academic time period became effective. This does not provide a bound on date ranges or milestones associated with this time period, but instead indicates the time period proper. This is a similar concept to the effective date on enumerated values. When an expiration date has been specified, this field must be less than or equal to the expiration date.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: End Date

property.name: summary
property.value: Date and time the academic time period expires.

property.name: label
property.value: End Date

property.name: description
property.value: Date and time the academic time period expires. This does not provide a bound on date ranges or milestones associated with this time period, but instead indicates the time period proper. If specified, this must be greater than or equal to the effective date. If this field is not specified, then no expiration date has been currently defined and should automatically be considered greater than the effective date.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Admin Org Id

property.name: summary
property.value: The adminsitrative organization responsible for maintaining this time period.

property.name: label
property.value: AdminOrg Id

property.name: description
property.value: The adminsitrative organization responsible for maintaining this time period.

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
